channel.title: Drops turning off HELP ME
channel.description:
okay after a while, the drops r being switched off, impossible 2 turn back on, i have to restart the server to make it work.....
i hate restarts, the only reason i restart the server is bcuz of the drops turning off...
so i been wandering, sure there must b a way, if u have any clues post em, i need help ASAP!
my gues it has something 2 do with MonsterDropItem (its a czar source btw)
help
